common_description: Since two epses with K_1=4 overfits a lot compared to just one eps, I decided to try K_1=3.. I haven't done grid search of lr for K_1=3. So it might be that this lr is just too low, and that's why the results are not better than with K_1=4. But this discouraged me from experimenting with making kernel size smaller.

experiments.name: K_1=3, lr=4e-5, init_epses_composition_unit_theoretical_output_std
experiments.description: First kernel size is 3. Initialization makes intermediate representations have unit std THEORETICALLY if input vectors of each EPS are i.i.d. (He initialization)

experiments.name: K_1=3, lr=4e-5, init_epses_composition_unit_empirical_output_std
experiments.description: First kernel size is 3. Initialization is normal and then rescaled so as to make empirical std of intermediate representations equal to 1.
